name: Pokémon Abismal
summary:
A thousand years ago, a meteorite hit the Kingdom of Celestia. From its interior, an evil being emerged that tried to plunge the world into darkness, but after a bloody war, that being was banished to another dimension... Until now, because it is said that the seal that held him captive has been destroyed.

Live a unique adventure to unravel the mysteries surrounding the Kingdom of Celestia. A radical climate change, the appearance of the mysterious Astral Pokémon and the existence of a sect that worships the Dark Star are just some of the many threats to the peace of the kingdom.

Will you be able to save Celestia from its end or will you be a mere witness to its destruction?
